resources.string: Cannot synchronize information from GooglePlay, please make sure you have Internet connection and signed in your GooglePlay account.

You have no subscription or your subscription state cannot be determined currently. Please check your Internet connection and make sure you have signed in the GooglePlay account that has made this subscription.
You have already got premium subscription(s).
You have already got this subscription, to cancel it, please use Google PlayStore App.
You have another existing subscription, if you made this new subscription, please remember to cancel the other one from Google PlayStore.
Subscribe to OmniGIF Premium, you can get rid of the AD and have unlimited access to all the features.
Click and watch AD is a great support to us and we will reduce the AD display frequency for our supporters!\n\nHowever, you should ONLY click the AD that you are interested.
3-Month-Premium. Unlimited accessing to all features, no advertisement.
1-Year-Premium. Unlimited accessing to all features, no advertisement.
OmniGIF pro app. Permanent unlimited accessing to all features without any advertisement.
